This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS table size is interpreted as border-box width by default
PASS table size is interpreted as minimum width
PASS table size border-box
PASS table size border-box interpreted as minimum width
FAIL table size content-box assert_equals: expected 100 but got 60
PASS table size content-box interpreted as minimum width
Harness: the test ran to completion.
